article.headline: Robert Morris 76, Cent. Connecticut St. 64
article.story: MOON TOWNSHIP, Pa. -- Jeremy Chappell scored 21 points and Robert Morris charged to a 22-point lead in the first half on the way to 76-64 victory over Central Connecticut on Thursday night. Jimmy Langhurst and Mezie Nwigwe each scored 13 points and nine players figured in the scoring for Robert Morris (11-7, 6-1 Northeast Conference), which led 41-19 at the half and shot 51 percent (27-for-53) in the game. Ken Horton scored 16 points, Chris Baskerville added 11 and Tamir Johnson grabbed 10 rebounds for Central Connecticut (7-9, 3-3), which made eight of 27 shots in the first half and 24 of 61 overall. Robert Morris outscored Central Connecticut 14-8 in the paint 15-6 off turnovers and 10-6 off the bench on the way to its 22-point lead by halftime.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
